description:
The cable ski tracks design on this toque carries fond memories with it. Running errands or grabbing a bite in town? Wear your Tracks toque so that you’ve still got skiing on your mind (or on your head).

  • Made with 100% wool
  • Fleece headband lining for added comfort & warmth
  • Handmade in Nepal
name: Ambler Tracks Toque - Women's
